lender.name: Madhu
lender.loan_because: its the least i can do.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I believe that Jesus Christ calls us to love our fellow man. Helping someone find a way to improve their livelihood allows us to live as we were made to be.
lender.occupational_info: I type things into a computer today so more people can do less typing tomorrow.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Tom and Judy
lender.occupation: retired Engineer and retired Computer Programmer

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: I lived in South America for 2 years and saw people in desperate situations seek out predatory lenders, which in the end only exacerbated their poverty. I know that microfinance is a constructive way to get people out of poverty without creating dependency, and I hope to see it grow throughout the world.

lender.name: Debbie and Adam
lender.occupational_info: Debbie does advocacy work for ZERO TO THREE, a non-profit promoting the healthy development of infants & toddlers. Adam is an attorney specializing in free speech and freedom of the press.

lender.name: karen
lender.loan_because: I think it is an opportunity to give something back.
lender.occupational_info: I am interested in growing organic food on small scales.

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: I've been more fortunate than many and it's time for me to give back. I believe in giving people a "hand up" and my experience with Kiva tells me that given an extra "hand", people can make real strides towards improving the quality of their lives.
lender.occupational_info:
I work in the life sciences field and focus on the development of new products and markets.
I appreciate the entrepreneurial spirit and respect the hard work of the many entrepreneurs that Kiva supports.

lender.name: gerald
lender.loan_because: I believe in "Being the change I want to see in the world", to quote Ghandi
lender.occupational_info: Cooking, tending bar, managing restaurants or bars, etc.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I like to help people and try to make a difference in people's lives. Pay it forward. =)

lender.name: Elaine
lender.loan_because: I want to support the initiative of these entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: I left my work in the non-profit sector in August 2010 to go to Yale Divinity School in New Haven, CT. I've long felt a call into ordained ministry as a way of preaching good news to the poor and exhorting those who have to share the wealth with those who have not!

lender.name: Ray & Linda
lender.loan_because: Kiva is an easy way to offer assistance. We enjoy seeing our portfolio grow over time as we make new loans and re-loan the funds that are paid back.
lender.occupational_info: Ray works in institutional research at Westminster College.

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: I've been fortunate to have perhaps a little more than I need, so I'd like to pass on something to someone who has less than they need.

lender.name: Ava
lender.loan_because: I feel that it's right to give money to people in need so they can make a living too. I feel really happy that I helped at least one person, and I'm just a kid and I'm helping grownups and their kids!
lender.occupational_info: As a student I work hard and try to get my grades really good. I work on reading and math and I'm really happy that I'm going into first grade.

lender.name: Dixie
lender.loan_because: Here in the United States, even if you think that you do not have much, you have more than most. I am not a millionaire, or even a person with hundreds of thousands. I went to China in 2007, and the trip taught me just how very much I do have. Seeing women beg in the street for money for milk to give their children, cripples crutching by me using sticks, it was a real wake up call. it feels good to keep a map of places and people that I have helped. One day, I want to have helped people in every country of the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the construction business, and in the photography business. I take pictures and I build things.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because:
My little bit makes a difference. And, all of our little bits will change the world for the better.
The task of eliminating extremes of wealth and poverty is one thing that humanity must do before there will be world peace. Agencies like KIVA are a step in that direction.
I hope you join us in making a difference.
P.S. When you join. Join a team. If you are a Baha'i, join the Baha'i Team. http://www.kiva.org/team/kiva_bahais
"Let deeds, not words, be your adorning." -Bahá'u'lláh
.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Registered Nurse. I work as a team leader in a local hospital.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I develop buildings for low-income people. www.lihi.org

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: Someday I'll have more to give than my time... someday.
lender.occupational_info: Fueling a desire to learn.

lender.name: erica
lender.loan_because: The world's a small place and we all need as much support and encouragement as we can get.

lender.name: Cassandra
lender.loan_because: opportunity opens doors.

lender.name: Kirsten
lender.loan_because: there is so much inequality in the world, and this might be a tiny step in the right direction.
lender.occupational_info: I work to end violence against women.

lender.name: April
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed financially and want to pass the blessing along. I believe in 'Paying it Forward'
lender.occupational_info: I am so blessed to be able to stay home and care for my children. My husband and I have three biological children and we've adopted three. We have three boys and three girls ranging in ages from 14 years down to 1 1/2 years old.

lender.name: Desiree
lender.loan_because: I am blessed and in a position to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I am an attorney devoted to helping others.

lender.name: Philip
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Celeste
lender.loan_because: This is a small way that I can give back and help someone else. I believe if everyone did a little something like this our world would be a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I am a homemaker with three children. Mario is 12, Mia is 6 and Micah is 4. I stay very busy volunteering at their school and keeping the household in order. My husband is a police officer who works very hard to support our family.

lender.name: Eva
lender.loan_because: People around the world should help each other

lender.name: Randall
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with opportunities to have and enjoy a good life, and would like to help others do the same.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to adults in universities and cultural centers in Kobe/Osaka, Japan

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good to be able to help others. A small loan can go such a long way.

lender.name: Rose
lender.loan_because: I believe that micro-finance is one of the best ways to help people in need-it both provides and empowers.

lender.name: Sinead
lender.loan_because: As a small business owner, I have been given many opportunities for growth in my business. To help someone else with this is an amazing opportunity!
lender.occupational_info: Every day people who don't know me give me the gift of walking into my office and sharing their lives with me, asking for my help. It is an amazing way to spend my time.

lender.name: Dick
lender.loan_because: I care & want to help someone help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired electrical worker of power lines.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: I have had so much by accident of birth being in a wealthy country; sharing is good.

lender.name: Natasha & Dave
lender.loan_because: I am financially able to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I work with children and my husband writes computer software.

lender.name: Rick
lender.loan_because: I want to help, and show my kids that we can make a difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: Selling ideas, and helping businesses grow.

lender.name: Andrew, Amanda & Callum
lender.loan_because: Let's face it, the world is really just one big country & the sooner we realise it, the better off we'll all be. Until this fact becomes obvious to all, it should be the responsibility of the planet's more fortunate citizens to help her less fortunate citizens in what ever manner possible. Viva Kiva!
lender.occupational_info: I draw maps, mostly of places I will never visit.

lender.name: VICTOR
lender.loan_because: I want to print my magazine which contains the message of life to the people of nigeria, so as to change them from corruption to a better face of life. Am a founder of an organization named: MCLIM ASSIDUOUS WORLD.
lender.occupational_info: Am an author.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I want to spread my good.
lender.occupational_info: Telecommunications VOIP manager

lender.name: Trevor
lender.loan_because: Access to capital is a key ingrediant to prosperity.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: With as little as a $25.00 investment in the hopes and dreams of people around the world who are working to become self-sufficient, you can make a difference in the lives of others. Also, my daughter, Liz, previously worked at KIVA.org.
lender.occupational_info: Marketing Communications encompasses all the communications between an organization and its audiences, including advertising, sales promotion, personal selling, publicity, public relations, and direct marketing. I am fortunate to work for a community foundation and people who are passionate about making a difference through philanthropy.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I loan in honor of those I've met around the world who have shared their stories with me.

lender.name: NanoFina
lender.loan_because: I believe in the entrepreneur spirit and to give someone a chance to work for him/herself. Also, in a small way I can help change someone's life for the better.

lender.name: Lynne
lender.loan_because: I think this a great way to help people overseas to help themselves
lender.occupational_info: I work in the International Student Affairs Office at the University of Missouri-Kansas City

lender.name: Liz
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving something back.
lender.occupational_info: I manage teams of scientists and doctors that develop pharmaceutical drugs.

lender.name: Carl & Michele
lender.loan_because: We have seen what opportunities can do for people who want to support themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Challenging and fun!

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: I like to help.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: poverty sucks.

lender.name: DMA
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I use TV, the Internet and mobile phones to expand educational possibilities for people.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: By working together encouraging sustainable ventures, we can accomplish so much.
lender.occupational_info: We supply our customers some of the world's best coffee at reasonable prices.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: It seemed like a good thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I teach kids math.

lender.name: L L
lender.loan_because: It never hurts to lend a hand.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: Efforts toward social sustainability are "the right thing to do".

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: "Some people have more than they need, other people need more than they have"
lender.occupational_info: I try to connect people with the book or piece of information they need, when they need it - not unlike what Kiva strives to do with small business owners and loans.

lender.name: Randy Fay
lender.occupation: bicycle tourist and former Kiva Fellows
lender.loan_because: It is our pleasure to do a little tiny part to share in someone else's life.
lender.occupational_info: We are bicycling from the north pole to the south pole in the Americas

lender.name: Nancy Lewis
lender.occupation: Kiva Fellow with Friendship Bridge in Guatemala
lender.loan_because: It is a pleasure to share!
lender.occupational_info: We are taking interviewing the women clients of MFI Friendship Bridge in Guatemala and posting them on the Kiva website.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: It is needed. And it is easy!
lender.occupational_info: I shoot news.

lender.name: Scott & Kelly
lender.loan_because: We have so much. We must help
lender.occupational_info: We build custom homes

lender.name: The Four of Us
lender.loan_because: We loan because we want to share the blessings we have been given.

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: I can. My husband and I have been fortunate in life. I care about people and Kiva allows me to make a difference, person to person.
lender.occupational_info: I work as the assistant to the President of my company. It is a large, private ambulance service. I am very proud of our work.

lender.name: Zoe
lender.loan_because: I am amazed that such a relatively small amount of money (by US standards) can go so far in helping someone improve their life.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: It makes a difference

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: I am lucky and I am able.
lender.occupational_info: I teach 11-15 year old middle school students in a free public school.

lender.name: CrystalGypsy Designs
lender.loan_because: My jewelry business was started through an inheritance and would not exist if it wasnt for this geneorosity, so I love to help people in any way that I can to support their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I love my work. I grew up as a musician and singer that has seen me tour and record with major international artists acorss the globe. I now have a jewelry company as well that incorporates talismans from around the world, especially old amulets from Tibet. This work led to becoming an energy healer and my jewelry is energized with reiki. You can find my music at www.spacejunky.com

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: It seems like magic to me. Several years ago I invested in Kiva and the money keeps giving. I loan, get paid back and loan again knowing that I'm improving lives in countries I could only hope to visit: Paraguay, Armenia, Lebanon, Mongolia and Tajikistan to name just a few.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I can make a difference

lender.name: Bill & Yvonne
lender.loan_because: Because we believe in helping people.
lender.occupational_info: We have spent our working lives in public service occupations.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I want to help the world become successful so that people can stay in thier own country and build it like the 1st world.
lender.occupational_info: i help business owners get finanicing for equipment they need to grow their company

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: my wife made me do it. I introduced Kiva to the family and proposed that we invest in others. She insisted that we had to.
lender.occupational_info: Teaching and Research; U. S. Fulbright Scholar in Vilnius, Lithuania Jan-July 2011

lender.name: Droeger Family
lender.loan_because: It feels good.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I'm lucky to have what I do. I feel an obligation to do my part for others.
lender.occupational_info: I'm studying to become and acupuncturist and herbalist.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: This organization gives people from all over the world a chance to meet entrepreneurs in need of relatively small funds to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired now but worked for years in the medical field, writing newsletters, manuals, and booklets to educate people who had severe injuries--brain and spinal cord in particular.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.occupation: At Home with Adele and Alice

lender.name: Bethany and Joe
lender.loan_because: it's our duty to help each other.

lender.name: Emad
lender.loan_because: So little can go so far if you really appreciate what it's like not to have. I know I loan to people that appreciate
lender.occupational_info: I am trying in my little way to save the world by developing fuel cells that will provide cheap energy to all those that need it without major impact on our environment

lender.name: KEVIN
lender.loan_because: you get what you give.
lender.occupational_info: I make marketing videos for a big company.

lender.name: Anette & Ed
lender.loan_because: Just a little can go a long way for so many people...
lender.occupational_info: Ed is an environmental scientist and Anette is a graphic designer

lender.name: Lynnette
lender.loan_because: I believe that we were all put on this earth to help each other.

lender.name: Nicholas E. Haniotis
lender.loan_because: It is necessary for those who "honestly" need the money!
lender.occupational_info: If this is about employment, I fix copiers with the hopes of doing computer work.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: it's a simple, interesting way to help people uplife themselves from poverty.

lender.name: Joan
lender.occupation: English Teach in Jeonju City, South Korea

lender.name: Gordon
lender.loan_because: I am lucky enough to be able to loan.
lender.occupational_info: I assist large businesses with different objectives, ranging from fraud investigations and legal defense to financial reporting and compliance.

lender.name: Jacques
lender.loan_because: This is something I have done since high school. I hope to help parents in need which in turn helps the children.
lender.occupational_info: teaching environmental responsibility

lender.name: Nick
lender.loan_because: My parents made many sacrifices to ensure that I received a good education. I feel privileged that I have completed all my studies at University and am now working at one of the most innovative technology companies in the world. I hope that my loans are able to help parents in poorer parts of the world establish their businesses so that they are able to put their children through a good education too.

lender.name: Arlene
lender.loan_because: It's fun. I have lived in or visited these countries. I find welcoming, generous people wherever I go, and this is a start at repaying some of their friendship and hospitality.

lender.name: Betsy
lender.loan_because: This is a way to reach people across the world and help them better the lives of themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a non-profit organization that helps children who have been victims of abuse and neglect.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: Its a great idea
lender.occupational_info: I study parasites of food production animals

lender.name: Syed Tahir
lender.loan_because: In our country man power is available and the production cost is cheep
lender.occupational_info:
Dear Check My Work I am syed Tahir Abbas Rizvi I am calligraphy artist In order to rebuild my portfolio (I've been away from Calligraphy Paintings for a while) I am offering sale calligraphy to individuals or galleries who have an interest in this field. I am working after the high imagine in paint word in small scale. I have my own style that I just finished calligraphy two weeks ago and I am eager to use it as well as other outstanding work. Please recommend anyone who you think is like calligraphy painting. I need people to see my work. I have a relationship with local galleries that would like to see my work and the said plan solo exhibition. Take a moment to check out examples of my work at www.namwar.com
Best Regards
syed@namwar.com M: 0321-4190720

lender.name: KelJean
lender.loan_because:
My lovely wife and I dream to be financially free. While we are working towards our dream, we want to help others work towards theirs.
Thank you KIVA for empowering us to create 'miracles' for these encouragable individuals. We sincerely hope in the near future, they will also join us in helping to make this world a better place.

lender.name: Mame
lender.loan_because: This is a fantastic program for bringing people together in a way that - small piece by small piece - improves people's lives and encourages positive changes in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I teach at a university -- about art, and about the role art plays in expressing and shaping cultures.

lender.name: shadab
lender.loan_because: to grow my bussiness and help my society
lender.occupational_info: complete online one stop solution/ service industry/ bussiness promoter

lender.name: Collin
lender.loan_because: To help people improve themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Maintain Lawns and Landscaping

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: Some of us have advantages that have nothing to do with our own efforts - like being born in a better place. I want to share with those who are trying to do more with the few advantages they have created for themselves

lender.name: Messiah Adult Group
lender.loan_because: its a way of loving...
lender.occupational_info: We are a Christian mission group

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: someone helped me once, and now I can help other people.
lender.occupational_info: I work with a team to make sure that goods and information go where they need to go, on time, and that the quality of my company's service and production is high.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I want to help people make a life for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I help authors, editors and publishers acquire images for use in their publications. Once images are selected, I negotiate license agreements with the copyright holders that grant permission for the images to be published.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to have the means to do so.

lender.name: Tiana M.
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in other lives.

lender.name: Richard & Gloria
lender.loan_because: we are able.
lender.occupational_info: Long hours, tedious.

lender.name: Tori
lender.loan_because: I love to help people, and I want to be a good steward of everything God has blessed me with. Christ commands us to reach out to the poor and this is an excellent way to do it.

lender.name: Roger
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of the money circulating from one crafts person to another as it is borrowed and repaid over and over.
lender.occupational_info: I used recycled and salvaged wood to make wooden household articles, toys and games. I sell them at market stalls and online at Etsy.com

lender.name: Bonnie
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great way to help distribute money to those who need it in order to grow microbusinesses in areas of the world that need it most.

lender.name: Joel
lender.loan_because: "coherent, organic, self-organized congregations involving tens of millions of people dedicated to change" Paul Hawken-Blessed Unrest
lender.occupational_info: I provide and teach sustainable/organic lifestyle methods.

lender.name: Sussi
lender.occupation: early retired because I suffer from schizophrenia
lender.loan_because: I like this project. I like helping and I like the idea of helping someone who has a vision. Someone who really need the money for a project they will work hard for and a project that will help improve his/her (+ family) way of life (economically). I also sponsor 6 kids and one adult in Uganda, Kenya and Nepal.
lender.occupational_info: I am not working, unfortunately :'(

lender.name: Benjamin
lender.loan_because: i think it's a brilliant idea! ... i can ... it feels good ... and it's more than words

lender.name: Fallon
lender.loan_because: one way to show true love beyond limitations is to give from the soul out of one's own finances. Give and give cheerfully!
lender.occupational_info: I am a stay at home mother of four young children. My spouse works while I care for the home and aid in instilling faith and character into our children.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: It's a small gesture on my part that improves a life for someone far away. I know these loans make a difference and since I don't have the means to fund a large charity, this helps me stay humble and feel a little bit good for doing a little bit of good!
lender.occupational_info: Working hard to enjoy life.

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: I like to help create a more equal world.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a library where I help teenagers.

lender.name: In Jesus Name
lender.loan_because: everyone should have a chance to better their situation.

lender.name: Wim Bouman
lender.loan_because: I think it is a simple, easy and good thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Consultant at one of the major utilities company in The Netherlands. Furthermore, I am a Research Fellow at the University of Amsterdam Business School.

lender.name: Keith
lender.loan_because: Kiva puts GK Chesterton's "distributed capitalism" into practice, and I want to see it work.
lender.occupational_info: I apply lean manufacturing principles to low volume - high variety production.

lender.name: Judah
lender.loan_because: It helps me feel connected to people around the world

lender.name: Melanie
lender.occupational_info: Making sandwiches at Subway Restaurant

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: I am lucky to have a good life and want to give back. With Kiva, I know I am helping people who work hard to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I review plans for building permits.

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: I thought this was the most incredible, innovative idea that I heard in a long time! As a former fundraiser and a person that supports several charities, I was looking for ways to do more on a global level. I have suppported organizations like the American Red Cross, UNICEF, and others in the past and I like the fact that Kiva provides direct support to people who need it.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the oldest and leading community development and environmental bank in the country.

lender.name: Dayna
lender.loan_because: I want to help other hardworking parents get ahead.
lender.occupational_info: I am the mom of three teenage children. My husband has his own business and I am a freelance writer.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: My wonderful friend, Dawn, taught me about this amazing program and opportunity to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I work with The Nature Conservancy, an international non-profit whose mission is to preserve the plants, animals and natural communities that represent the diversity of life on Earth by protecting the lands and waters they need to survive.

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: I feel bad.

lender.name: Stephen & Michelle
lender.loan_because: My wife and I are blessed and have much, this allows us a chance to give something back and hopefully make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Repaired computer communications & telephone equipment..

lender.name: Debjani
lender.loan_because: I want the world a better place to be for women who are faced with needless challenges to survive and raise their family with dignity.

lender.name: Vanessa
lender.loan_because: I care about climate change — and socio-economic change.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a journalist who write about movies, books, travel and the environment for one of Canada's major national newspapers. I also have a website called Green as a Thistle.

lender.name: Thomas L.
lender.loan_because: It is easy, effective and does the soul good.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I want to help others.
lender.occupational_info: It gets more interesting every year.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I believe that free markets and entrepreneurship are a solution and those who have benefited from those free markets should give back.
lender.occupational_info: I am involved in starting and running new biotechnology companies which are developing medicines to treat disease.

lender.name: Keisha
lender.loan_because: I'm always moved by ambitious individuals, especially those that have so little, but still attempt to achieve their dreams.

lender.name: Pet
lender.loan_because: I fell in love at first sight with Kiva! I know what it's like to try and start a small business with little money, so having the opportunity to keep using the same funds over and over to help many people do the same fits my soul in just the right place.
lender.occupational_info: I publish books for children and make short free cartoons about a funny orange cat named Loki.

lender.name: Devin
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed by God, and I would like to pass that blessing on to others.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I help my company sell its products.

lender.name: Daniela
lender.loan_because: I loan because it is a simple and direct way to help others. I also want to support the microfinance model.

lender.name: Pradeep
lender.loan_because: "I am only one, but still I am one. I cannot do everything, but still I can do something; and because I cannot do everything, I will not refuse to do something I can do"

lender.name: Suzanne
lender.occupational_info: I work with teachers, finding them books and websites they can use to teach their students. I excite children about books, and teach them how to find information using the public library.

lender.name: James & Valorie
lender.loan_because: I want to help and lending lets me help more than once.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a local government agency that enforces child support payments

lender.name: Diana
lender.loan_because: A helping hand is often all any of us need and I am here to extend the hand.
lender.occupational_info: I am an artist like many across the world. I am old enough to be the teacher to the youngsters.

lender.name: Douglas
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Tanja
lender.loan_because: It's important to be involved in the worlddevelopment.
lender.occupational_info: A very busy office job with a lot of fullfilment

lender.name: OGUNLOWO
lender.loan_because: i have about 2arces of land inherited from my father,which i use for farming for the househould use and little are taken to the market for selling.i need to enlarge the production capacity and start exporting by buying farm products from local farmers, repack it and export it.
lender.occupational_info: stressful using cruel implements which produce low productivity,butwhen farming is done in a large way its labour will be directly proportional to the production.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: My Christian faith compels me to love my neighbor as myself.
lender.occupational_info: I am a skin cancer surgeon.

lender.name: sharon
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of helping others to help themselves!

lender.name: Earl & Stephanie
lender.loan_because: We have a wonderful life and by lending, we hope that we can help someone else build a wonderful life for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Earl conducts commercial vessel inspections and Stephanie works as a physical therapist.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I've seen first-hand the difference 25 dollars can make -- multiply that a couple times, and you can have a real impact.
lender.occupational_info: I help manage the online advocacy program at Oxfam America.

lender.name: David Panko
lender.loan_because: I consider the loan an investment which will help people improve the quality of their lives through entrepreneurship.
lender.occupational_info: I help people invest their money.

lender.name: Katherine
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I assist companies create Quality Programs that will help them service their customers better.

lender.name: Lanet
lender.loan_because: I believe that it is important to give back whenever possible. There were a lot of people who helped me financially when I was working my way through college, and now it is my turn to help someone else. One of my mentors uses a phrase that I like very much- "Be the change you want to see in the world".
lender.occupational_info: I am an elementary school counselor. I teach kids how to make good choices and be productive members of society. I encourage them to strive for their goals and never give up!

lender.name: Marsha
lender.loan_because: it is a very simple way to do a good thing.
lender.occupational_info: I raise Gypsy Horses in Oklahoma. My foundation stock were imported from England and Ireland.

lender.name: laura
lender.loan_because: it would be wrong for me not to. I own an ipod, a car, and a george forman grill. I have two dogs that get fed and sleep in air conditioning. 25 bucks is pizza night.
lender.occupational_info: I am a nurse who takes care of people who's kidneys do not work

lender.name: Albert Goins
lender.loan_because: Human beings need to help each other out.
lender.occupational_info: I program computers to help people get good health care.

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: believing in yourself and others is one of the greatest gifts we have!

lender.name: Harold Popma
lender.loan_because: I want to connect with people around the world and learn about them.
lender.occupational_info: I am a semiretired doctor who spends most of his time looking after people who are very old.

lender.name: Howard
lender.loan_because: It is the only way to break the cycle of poverty
lender.occupational_info: Help start sustainable small businesses for people or communties at risk

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: what a great idea!
lender.occupational_info: I teach English as a Second Language to 6th graders (11-12) at a public school.

lender.name: Rudy Patudy
lender.occupation: Best Dog in the Entire World
lender.loan_because: My mom really likes to help people in need. EVEN puppies like me! She rescued me from a shelter and I have the best life now, with a mom and a dad and my best friend LuLu who is a rescue dog also.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: I've seen how far money can go in developing areas, and how much every little bit helps.
lender.occupational_info: My day job supports my great interest in Latin American development.

lender.name: K Saravanan
lender.loan_because: it can make a change in their life and promotes self reliance.
lender.occupational_info: marketing and sale of solar PV module manufacturing equipment.

lender.name: Suzie
lender.loan_because: it's rather hard to justify not doing it.

lender.name: Nyla
lender.loan_because: Gratitude. I have been traveling the globe since age 7. Along the way I have met many, many people very similar to those entrepreneurs we are lending to here. They are the friendliest people in the world. Thanks to Kiva for letting me show my gratitude!

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: We all need help sometime. Generosity and compassion are important aspect to practice.
lender.occupational_info: Now that I have retired from teaching school, I write articles for a newspaper. I especially enjoy writing about people who think in different ways.

lender.name: Micah
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: le trung
lender.loan_because: I loan for my small business.
lender.occupational_info: search google

lender.name: beHo Family
lender.loan_because: In 1999, one of our first clients was a remarkable California-born woman living in Uganda. She had developed and was managing a micro-finance effort. I was proud to have been involved with this type of work in its infancy on the world wide web. Kiva represents, to me, the evolution of the earlier grassroots efforts of people like Christina from Life in Africa. Seeing that LiA is a Kiva lending partner makes me happy!
lender.occupational_info: beHo is an indie web host serving small, home-based, and micro businesses. My husband and I knit and are writing a (series of) book(s)... doing what we love, believing in each other and working toward our true right livelihood.

lender.name: Lois
lender.loan_because: What an awesome way to share the abundance in your life! Imagine if everyone who COULD do it DID do it...

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: Help those less financially fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: Model and automate complex processes.

lender.name: THE SOORMA FAMILY
lender.loan_because: IT HELPS SOMEONE MAKE THERE DREAM COME TRUE.IF EVERYONE GIVES THEN, A POINT IN TIME,WHEN EVERYONE WILL BE ON THE SAME LEVEL
lender.occupational_info: THE EASIEST THING IS GIVING,THE HARDEST IS RECEVING

lender.name: Debra
lender.loan_because: I want to give a little back, especially to the countries & people who have so generously welcomed me in my travels. I also want to teach my children about global responsibility.

lender.name: James i Agnieszka
lender.loan_because: The money we loaned was raised at our wedding in June 2007. We asked people to give us money instead of buying flowers and used that money to start this account.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I've been blessed with the opportunity to give people a chance to rise above poverty. Each person deserves the chance to make an honest living and provide for their families.

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: I have started a small business and I want to give others the chance to do the same.
lender.occupational_info: I own a small law firm focusing my practice on construction, real estate and public bond law.

lender.name: Carrie
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I write novels and picture books.

lender.name: Sam
lender.loan_because: Across the world, people have gone out of their way to be nice to me. Now it's my turn.
lender.occupational_info: I'm just an ordinary person from Ireland.

lender.name: susan
lender.occupation: Many trades.. mom first and foremost
lender.loan_because: My sister got me into it. Thanks sis!
lender.occupational_info: I am a Mom, A Doula, A Cloth Diaper maker, A Children's Upscale Resale store employee, a wife, a housekeeper (not so good at that one)

lender.name: L.D.
lender.loan_because: This is a wonderful opportunity for me to assist someone in another country who wants to improve his/her economic status and is facing the challenge of providing for family needs.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired--formerly worked in the credit card industry, advertising, and education.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I have been lucky to have help that allows me to do well financially. I lived in Singapore and Nigeria for a year each as a child - my father was a professor.

lender.name: Meera
lender.loan_because: I believe in change.

lender.name: Diane & John
lender.loan_because: We think it is important to support small business in all parts of the world. As Americans we feel it is important to give back to others.

lender.name: Marylu
lender.loan_because: I think it will make a difference.

lender.name: June & Cody
lender.loan_because: My grandson and I want to be involved in helping people throughout the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired high school history teacher and my grandson is a sixth grade student.

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: I want to help women in developing countries become more self sufficient and lead better lives for themselves and their children.

lender.name: Newton North High School
lender.loan_because: We are part of an international organization, Youth Microcredit International, committed to empowering youth through microcredit.
lender.occupational_info: We fundraise and spread awareness about the power and potential of microcredit.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: In life, I have been blessed with people who love and support me. I want to support others because we are all one.
lender.occupational_info: I develop computer software. I focus on Internet/Web development.

lender.name: Bob and Fran
lender.loan_because: it will be interesting to see our money at work and to help others.

lender.name: johnny
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed and want to make the world a better place. One person can make a difference. I am a capitalist and believe the free enterprise system can help fight poverty by empowering others to help themselves. Plus, doing a little good warms my soul.
lender.occupational_info: I'm in the Dog and Cat food business. Buy Science Diet at PETSMART!!

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I'm really grateful for my life, health, family and friends and I love being able to show my gratitude in this way -- helping someone else directly and making a difference in their life.

lender.name: MCC Youth Group
lender.loan_because: We are a very socially active church and congregation. As a youth group, we decided we wanted to do something on our own to make a difference, so we raised the money we loan through Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: We are a youth group at the Meriden Congregational Church, a United Church of Christ Church.

lender.name: Dee
lender.loan_because: What matters is not to know the world, but to change it.
lender.occupational_info: I teach children, in school, to understand that every view of the world that becomes extinct, every culture that disappears, diminishes a possibility of life.

lender.name: Donald
lender.loan_because: I like to think that occasionally and in a very small way I am a them (as in "it's up to them to do something about it")

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I would like to help others who are helping themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I help others with managing their money and resources.

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because:
“If I am not for myself, who will be for me? If I am not for others, what am I? And if not now, when?” - Rabbi Hillel
"In charity there is no excess." - Francis Bacon
lender.occupational_info: How would I describe my work? Eye-opening, intriguing, fun, and most importantly, rewarding.

lender.name: Holly
lender.loan_because: My business was started with a loan.
lender.occupational_info: I support women during pregnancy and childbirth.

lender.name: Dekin
lender.loan_because: What goes around comes around.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: Because I can.

lender.name: Hermie
lender.loan_because: i need to build a small business here in cebu.also to help my family.
lender.occupational_info: i work as a watcher and cashier here in internet also assist for the customers help about internet

lender.name: Michael & Vanessa
lender.loan_because: We believe in entrepreneurial spirit and that individuals can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Play cards online.

lender.name: Aina Mae
lender.loan_because: Reaching out to strangers and making a huge difference in their lives is a truly remarkable thing for me. I look forward to helping more people through Kiva
lender.occupational_info: I work as an Operations Manager it a Philippine-based Call Center. I work a minimum of 12 hours every day, hoping to motivate the people that I work with to wordk hard and mak a difference out there too.

lender.name: Robert H.
lender.loan_because: It is helping a person or family become self sufficent.
lender.occupational_info: President of a small ambulance company.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: It is so easy and I am very grateful for what I have and I imagine it makes a difference. Thank you KIVA.

lender.name: Bob, Gina, Alex & Yulin
lender.loan_because: If you give someone $25 to for a meal, and they will be hungry again in a few days. If you give someone $25 to build a business, they can build a future and hopefully never go hungry again.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: Love and abundance are most meaningful when shared.
lender.occupational_info: I perform wedding ceremonies for people of many cultures here in Los Angeles, CA. and serve my local and world community as a volunteer and donor.

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: every person deserves the chance to contribute positively to this world.

lender.name: Michelle & Corey
lender.loan_because: We really like the idea of lending to those who need it most

lender.name: Jeff and Diane
lender.loan_because: to learn about the world
lender.occupational_info: a family with three children

lender.name: Vu Nguyen
lender.occupational_info: Design for a cause.

lender.name: LuAnn
lender.occupation: homeschooler, caregiver for adults with MR/DD
lender.loan_because: I believe in paying it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I provide personal care and education to adults with mental retardation and developmental disabilities.

lender.name: jared joelle yvonne john
lender.loan_because: our family wishes to help other people

lender.name: Judith
lender.loan_because: As a small business owner I understand how it is to know within yourself you can do it - and all you need someone afford you the opportunity.

lender.name: Derrick
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: sitati
lender.occupational_info: this the business that is changing peoples health ang wealth status,however more ground work is to be done to ,educate them about what is happening ,health is paramount ,as it is the first asset that creates others .iam 34 years old, married with 2 children, and i depent on this for their upkeep

lender.name: Pierre
lender.loan_because: I have the chance to have a comfortable life. So I am glad that my small contribution goes directly to someone that needs it for a constructive project.
lender.occupational_info: Working in radiation protection a particle physics research laboratory

lender.name: Siri and Astrid
lender.loan_because: We believe in helping people so they can help themselves, not in charity alone.

lender.name: Luther
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed and I want to bless others.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of my children, my wife and lead the household.

lender.name: Molly
lender.loan_because: There but for the will of God it could be me needing help.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired after Nursing and raising a family. I enjoy gardening and growing my own vegetables.

lender.name: Rod
lender.loan_because: I like to assist people who have a good work ethic and try to improve themselves, their family, others and their country.
lender.occupational_info: I'm retired.

lender.name: Yolanda
lender.occupational_info: Business development consultant

lender.name: Sunny
lender.loan_because: I am able.
lender.occupational_info: I live in the mountains at 9600 ft elevation. My company provides medical grade oxygen to patients who have trouble breathing at this altitude!

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I like giving and in this life i have been blessed so it is only right to share
lender.occupational_info: I am the jack of all trades master of none, i must know a little about everything from A to Z! I love my work

lender.name: Ellenda
lender.loan_because: I like to help people that want to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to immigrants and refugees.

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: We have so much and others have so little. I suggest that we all keep the loans in the system, permanently!!

lender.name: Naomi
lender.loan_because: every little bit helps.

lender.name: Trae
lender.loan_because: I want to help others have the same opportunities that i have.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school so i can make the money i need to keep helping.

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: empowering individuals - the most sustainable way to make our world a better place!
lender.occupational_info: on my fourth career - managing a quant investment fund

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: It's important to do what you can. These small loans not only help build businesses and improve the quality of life , they help build dignity, pride and self respect for the many people who need them.

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do.

lender.name: Stephanie & Daniel
lender.loan_because: "Pay it forward."

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: I have more than I need and these people want a chance to improve. Good luck out there.
lender.occupational_info: I work in medical research.

lender.name: Seattle Kiva Divas
lender.loan_because: We are a group of all-girl poker players who found out about the program and decided to put our winnings to good use.

lender.name: KG
lender.loan_because: I feel although I am not in the ideal financial situation I would like to be in there are people struggling more than me and it is my obligation to help others.

lender.name: Nadja
lender.loan_because: As an entrepreneur, I know the challenges of starting or running a business. It's great to be able to support fellow entrepreneurs in other parts of the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am working with my partner on an innovative software to manage dynamic processes such as fundraising or campaigns, marketing campaigns and/or very complex sales processes,

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: Owning the means of production is essential to liberty and freedom.
lender.occupational_info: I take ideas from engineers, flesh out those ideas and place them on paper for manufacture.

lender.name: scott
lender.loan_because: It makes me happy to help. So many people have helped me, along the way. =)
lender.occupational_info: I sing and play guitar. (also bass keyboard with my feet, aka 'bass pedals') I perform in bars, restaurants, private residences, etc.

lender.name: Jennie Harris
lender.loan_because: I want to bless others; I am considered to be in poverty in America, even so I believe God has given me so much more then I need!
lender.occupational_info: I am a seventeen year old student. I work online as a web designer, making websites and running them.

lender.name: Josh
lender.loan_because: I believe that entrepreneurship is a positive step for any nation and I hope my contribution gives hope to the business owners I loan to.
lender.occupational_info: My Company Rents and Leases Trucks.

lender.name: Avi
lender.loan_because: beer
lender.occupational_info: beer

lender.name: DeAnn
lender.loan_because: There are good people everywhere trying to make life happen.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher of young children. Through education and opportunity my students will have better lives. I love people and I want to extend the opportunity for better lives to those who are willing to work.

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do. I feel that everyone that can participate should. This world would be a better place for it.
lender.occupational_info: I run an Information Technology department. I basically play with computers all day long.

lender.name: Logan
lender.loan_because: This is a great opportunity to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I do accounting and consulting work for small businesses, mostly restaurants.

lender.name: Maggie
lender.loan_because: it feels good.
lender.occupational_info: i take care of kids with cancer

lender.name: Guitar Gallery
lender.loan_because: I can and it's a great way to give back and help fellow women entrepeneurs
lender.occupational_info: retail sales of high-end, hand made guitars

lender.name: Traci
lender.loan_because: I just moved back from living in Bangladesh for two years. I have seen first hand how micro finance can help people but also how it can hurt them if not done correctly. I am happy to see that Kiva works with partners who focus on people with the necessary skills or who work to teach people these skills so that they can be successful and improve their lives..

lender.name: David
lender.occupational_info: I help communities figure out their transportation systems...trains, buses, sidewalks.

lender.name: Nicholas
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of partnering with someone for their success, even if I get no profit. there's something exciting about empowering others to succeed on their own terms.
lender.occupational_info: I help to build companies and brands.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I am interested in helping people from different parts of the world
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired scientist. I now enjoy teaching science to school children

lender.name: Hunt and Callee
lender.loan_because: We are happy to support entrepreneurship and individual hard work.
lender.occupational_info: I am a history professor and my wife is a partner in a consulting firm.

lender.name: Tom and Lynn
lender.loan_because: We can.
lender.occupational_info: Lynn works in education and Tom is a picture framer.

lender.name: DONALD
lender.loan_because: I admire people who regardless of their difficult circumstances, are eager to do what they can to improve their lot in life.
lender.occupational_info: I rent small storage spaces to people who haven't adequate room for their personal & household goods.

lender.name: Barb
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do - I can't control what my government does, but I can control what I do.
lender.occupational_info: I try to break computer programs so that people can fix them and make sure it can't happen again.

lender.name: Rita
lender.loan_because: I want others to be able to support their families like I am able to do.
lender.occupational_info: I advise small business regarding accounting, profitability and tax management

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: God loans to me.

lender.name: FAMODACA
lender.loan_because: because we like to do something for somebody else because we have so much, and we believe that microfinancing is a very good way for people to become more self-sufficient
lender.occupational_info: our nieces come and spend a week with us and we put on a "camp" for them-they are the campers and we the directors

lender.name: Drayken
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a chance to succeed. This is not a hand out but an oppourtunity to build.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a team of professionals that help businesses manage their cash flow.

lender.name: Ellen
lender.loan_because: I heard about this on Brotherhood 2.0 videoblog and it sounded like a great idea.

lender.name: Maendeleo Ya Wanawake
lender.loan_because: I have faith in the ability of women to turn the world around.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I have many blessings in my life, and I would like to bless some one else.
lender.occupational_info: I like to give back to the community, be it locally or globally.

lender.name: Debbie
lender.occupation: Office Manager for Interior Design Firm
lender.loan_because: This is such a great program! I like knowing that just a little bit can be such a big help. Makes me happy!!
lender.occupational_info: My job is to run the office - all the accounting, payroll, invoicing and whatever it takes to make things run smoothly!

lender.name: jim
lender.loan_because: because I know what it is like to need capital to start a small business. I think this is an excellent idea and I am glad to be of assistance.
lender.occupational_info: I sell replacement windows, siding, and roofing .

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I want to help, I started with nothing. I purchased my first property under HUD (US gov't). I've been blessed by God and feel a need to pass my blessings on to others. I'm waiting to see how KIVA works before I invest more.
lender.occupational_info: I invest in real estate in the US (Volusia County, Florida), buy and sell properties and have A few rental units.

lender.name: Jess
lender.loan_because: I have travled in Africa and seen the impact that local buisnesses have in their communities. I want to support the indipendance of people in developing countries.

lender.name: Maureen
lender.loan_because: I believe that making the world better happens one person at a time.

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: This is a wonderful way to help others help themselves.

lender.name: Rama
lender.loan_because: these are real people dreaming of real change
lender.occupational_info: Train and manage language instructors

lender.name: Hannah
lender.loan_because: My dad taught me to invest in people; not stocks or real estate.
lender.occupational_info: I have the privilege of working with youth who continually impart their wisdom to me of what it means to have determination, resiliency, and hope despite experiencing much pain in their lives

lender.name: David Anderton
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to create a life of their own and a loan provides that. The whole world is changing because of Kiva and people like you who lend. Creating your own success makes you feel alive. Empowered people lead to a happier, healthier and more peaceful world. If the U.S. spent hundreds of billions on microfinance rather than on wars you would feel you are in the movie "It's a Wonderful Life" at the ending for generations to come.
lender.occupational_info: I sell real estate. Know someone selling or buying real estate in America? I will help them find a Kiva friendly Realtor who will donate $500 to KIVA. Just call or e-mail me and I will introduce you! How fun!

lender.name: Carrie
lender.loan_because: As a recent college graduate, I understand the impact my generation can have on the world. I see the people I'm lending to as an inspiration for myself; seeing that with a little drive, determination, and sometimes a little help from somebody else, I can be successful and make my positive impact on the world that much greater.

lender.name: Trey
lender.loan_because: Redistribution can be the only solution.
lender.occupational_info: I serve about 170 folks as a Minister to Youth and Education

lender.name: Tersh
lender.loan_because: I know the value of small loans, and the value of the perspective gained by the running of small businesses
lender.occupational_info: I do remodeling of people's homes

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I think it is important to help those that are trying to help themselves.

lender.name: marie
lender.loan_because: it feels sooo good to give. and kiva is the best because it helps people to support themselves and to be independent.

lender.name: Hugh
lender.loan_because: I've started businesses and realize how important access to capital is.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I like to help people
lender.occupational_info: I like to travel, take pictures, drink wine and look at all the beauty in life

lender.name: JEMFan
lender.loan_because: sharing is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Computer programmer and systems analyst. Gardener and guinea pig servant.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I want people to have the chance for a better life.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of microlending.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Well, I study, I learn, I do the normal things a student would do. The money I lend isn't mine, it's my fathers, but I manage our portfolio.

lender.name: jennifer
lender.loan_because: I am thrilled to be starting my business full time and I am passionate about sharing my success with other other business owners who are also daring to reach for a better life.
lender.occupational_info: Put simply, fusing glass is a process of "melting" layers of glass in a kiln to create useable and wearable art ( lots of jewlery :) I am endlessly captivated by glass!

lender.name: Thomas&Sigrid
lender.loan_because: everyone should help

lender.name: Rashid
lender.loan_because: With a small effort we all can make a tremendous difference in somebody's life.
lender.occupational_info: Learning languages and doing my Masters Degree here in beautiful Istanbul.

lender.name: Jon & Nora
lender.loan_because: Microfinance has proven its effectiveness in fighting poverty, now it just needs to scale.
lender.occupational_info: Jon develops technology solutions for microfinance institutions, as a philanthropic initiative of salesforce.com. Nora advises airports in the areas of capital finance, airline negotiations, and federal policy.

lender.name: Lawson
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good and I like feeling good. :)
lender.occupational_info: Marketing solution engineer, inspirational writer, husband and father.

lender.name: Gordon
lender.loan_because: I prefer to support individuals rather than big organizations.
lender.occupational_info: I try to sort out the mess people get into when they use computers

lender.name: Sawyer Family
lender.loan_because: We are SO blessed compared to women in other parts of the world, and can pay it forward to make life better for more and more people.
lender.occupational_info: Taking sonograms to assist doctors in treating patients/homemaker/student

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: I am blessed abundantly in my life, and am able to do so without hardship. I think it is a good cause to contribute to.
lender.occupational_info: I am a full-time student 9 months out of the year. School, school asignments, school groups, and friends keep me busy in my life.

lender.name: Katherine
lender.loan_because: I can, and I think it helps people. It's very interesting to learn more about people around the world and what they do to get by. I'm proud of the people to whom I loan money.
lender.occupational_info: I teach university students and I do research and write books and articles. I also volunteer with the Green Party of Canada to try and bring about a sustainable future.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: I want to share some of the benefits I've had all my life with those who have had few. I like the directness Kiva allows, letting me deal on a one-to-one basis with people worldwide. The gift certificates are great.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a retired computer programmer, turned farmer. We have chickens, ducks, and bees, and raise a variety of vegetables.

lender.name: Todd & Jill
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a great way for anyone to support entrepreneurs all over the world. A little amount of money can make a big change in a borrower's life and their business' success.
lender.occupational_info: Todd is a graduate student in cancer biology. Jill is a high school social studies teacher.

lender.name: Josée
lender.loan_because: I like to help....

lender.name: Ifa
lender.loan_because: Recent U.N. Studies have shown that 90% of the worlds population are living on less than $2.00 USD a day. And, have very little of the basic means for decent standard of living. I want to help do my part.
lender.occupational_info: I work for First Fruits Development Group. A new enterprise of Social Entrepreneurs. We try to meet needs first, and worry about profits later.

lender.name: Gerald
lender.loan_because: I enjoy it.
lender.occupational_info: I build houses in Tucson, Arizona and I also have a cabinet and furniture shop in Obregon, Sonora, Mexico. I am the one in the middle.

lender.name: Penny
lender.loan_because: It's a great idea that really seems to work. Hats off to Nicholas Kristoff for promoting this.
lender.occupational_info: I'm fortunate be a part of a national nonprofit that fights hate and intolerance through litigation and education and works to protect the rights of the most vulnerable in our society.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.occupational_info: I teach students how to do mathematics

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: To assist industrious people in achieving their goals; because we who were fortunate to be born in a prosperous country should share our good fortune; because goodwill should not be constrained by borders; to improve the image of the US around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I write software. I'm married with three children - two in college and one who has graduated. I enjoy bicycling, shooting sports,listening to jazz and reading about science.

lender.name: SHORTY
lender.loan_because: I AM THANKFUL THAT MY FAMILY IS HEALTHY AND DOING WELL AND I AM ABLE TO TRY TO HELP SOMEONE ELSE!

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance at self-sufficiency and self-esteem
lender.occupational_info: Visit disabled and old people, help Red Cross overseas programs, sing in church choir

lender.name: Suzanne
lender.loan_because: it is my spiritual practice
lender.occupational_info: I teach life skills to students with disabilites ages 18-22.

lender.name: Herb
lender.loan_because: I am lucky to have been born and raised in this country rather than in the country of my ancestors. I want to help others to help themselves attain security.
lender.occupational_info: hospital volunteer

lender.name: Salim
lender.loan_because: I like to help people
lender.occupational_info: I run a small business myself. I help companies put their business on the Internet.

lender.name: Jill
lender.loan_because: I am so grateful for what I have. As a woman and a business owner, I want to help other women who are trying to sustain and grow a business.
lender.occupational_info: I create and advise nonprofit organizations in California. Many of my nonprofit organization clients serve agriculture.

lender.name: Andria R
lender.loan_because: I am blessed.
lender.occupational_info: I help engineers start companies in Silicon Valley, California.

lender.name: Randall
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving others the opportunity to strive and do better for themselves and their loved ones.

lender.name: Jackie
lender.loan_because: I have been very blessed in my life to have awesome family and friends and they would do this for me...so it's my turn to pay it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the title insurance industry for a major underwriter and I manage a program that allows us to provide agents with the tools and resources they need to grow their business while saving them time and money.

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: I believe that we all have a reponsibility to others as global citizens.

lender.name: Josie
lender.loan_because: I realize that a little money, in the right hands, can change lives. I own a retail business and know that sometimes you just need a little extra to expand or upgrade.
lender.occupational_info: I own a bookstore that sells books to children and adults.

lender.name: julie
lender.loan_because: I love to see what others can do with just a little help. If we can teach one family to support themselves...we can teach the world to do the same.

lender.name: M&G
lender.loan_because: Lending through Kiva provides the opportunity to make a small difference in someone's life, to improve their standard of living.

lender.name: Janis
lender.loan_because: Friends helped me get through a financial crisis several years ago. Kiva provides a wonderful way for me to "return the favor" by helping others.
lender.occupational_info: My job involves helping people manage their bank accounts and helping them get loans from the credit union.

lender.name: Kat
lender.loan_because: I was a Peace Corp vollunteer in Africa and I saw how a lottle can do a lot.
lender.occupational_info: Looking for work to put my talents to use in US or elsewhere.

lender.name: Harry
lender.loan_because: feels good!
lender.occupational_info: Proud member of the human race.

lender.name: John & Kathleen
lender.loan_because: My business was started in 1977 with a loan of $50. It grew through yearly loans for inventory for several years. I have been successfully self-employed ever since. I know the power of micro-finance! I want to pass on the opportunity to others.
lender.occupational_info: It started as a knitting cottage industry, but is now sales of hand dyed yarns and knitting for charity.

lender.name: Krankster
lender.loan_because: I am keen to support innovative ways to help needy make something for themselves.

lender.name: PHI Squared
lender.loan_because: We own a small business and I know how much everyone could use a little help to get started.
lender.occupational_info: We help others with computer systems

lender.name: Jonna
lender.loan_because: I started my own business from scratch with loans from my family and others, and I want to help others become self-sufficient. Also, because my brother lived in El Salvador for 6 years, and I love the area and the people - hard working, friendly, good people that just need a break.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a doctor in a clinic, and see adults in all walks of life. I enjoy helping people feel better, and the excitement of the puzzle of figuring out what the problems are, and how to fix them

lender.name: Sabina
lender.loan_because: I want to support women everywhere and it's the least I can do.....

lender.name: Logan
lender.loan_because: I believe in the human spirit and want to see others succeed and sustain themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I design and program software for computers. I also build computers and computer networks.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: It is my privilege to invest in a small way in entrepreneurs in developing countries. I loan a tiny fraction my abundance to empower others less fortunate than me, so that they might prosper. It is my privilege to invest in a small way in entrepreneurs in developing countries.

lender.name: Birrell Walsh
lender.loan_because: We need to share what we can. If you are willing to work hard to create a business, I am willing to help fund it a little.
lender.occupational_info: I am a television technician at a Public Broadcasting System station in San Francisco, and a novelist and poet.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I look into bodies and help "see" what is wrong.
